ModMetaData.name: Neon Rim: The Rimworld Signs Pack
ModMetaData.author: Horologium
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds a variety of Neon signs to Rimworld! Your colonists are not blocked by them either, being wall-mounted, however they do require power to run. To get the neon signs research Colored Lights. This mod is compatible with all saves, and as long as all signs are deconstructed can be removed safely.
